app.exercise.adt

Class RedBlackTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • app.exercise.adt.RedBlackTree<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<E>, java.util.Collection<E>

    public class RedBlackTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
    Class that implements a height balanced tree (a red-black-tree). Can be used for any type of Object E that implement Comparable"<"E">".
    Version:
    0.9
    Author:
    Alexander WÃ¤hling

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  RedBlackTree.Node
      inner Node-class that is used to as data containers for the red-black tree

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private RedBlackTree.Node anchor
      anchor always points to root.
      private static boolean BLACK
      boolean constant BLACK that stores the boolean value that represents the colour black (false)
      private static boolean RED
      boolean constant RED that stores the boolean value that represents the colour red (true)
      private RedBlackTree.Node root
      Reference to the current root of the red black tree.
      private int size
      Keeps track of the current size of the red black tree.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RedBlackTree()
      Default constructor that initializes a new RedBlackTree by properly creating and setting the anchor and root Nodes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(E data)
      Add passed Data into RedBlackTree by calling the insert Method of the current root with data to be inserted as argument.
      boolean contains(E element)
      Returns whether passed data is stored inside RedBlackTree by calling the node.contains() Method on the current root.

      Detes passed Node from RedBlackTree.

      Returns current black height of the red black tree.

      Returns Node whose data is the least greatest compared to passed Node.

      Returns current root of the tree.
      java.util.Iterator<E> iterator()
      Returns an in-order iterator to the current RedBlackTree.
      private void leftRotate(RedBlackTree.Node p)
      Performs a left rotation of the passed Node.
      private RedBlackTree.Node maxNode()
      Returns the Node with the maximum data inside.
      private RedBlackTree.Node minNode()
      Returns the Node wih the minimal data inside.
      private void repairDelete(RedBlackTree.Node p)
      Restores properties of the RedBlackTree after a deletion.
      private void repairInsert(RedBlackTree.Node p)
      Repairs the properties of the RedBlackTree after insertion.
      private RedBlackTree.Node rGetClosestNode(RedBlackTree.Node p)
      Returns Node whose data is the least less compared to passed Node.
      private void rightRotate(RedBlackTree.Node p)
      Performs a right rotation of the passed Node.
      java.util.Iterator<E> rIterator()
      Returns an reverse in-order iterator for the RedBlackTree.
      private void setAnchor(RedBlackTree.Node root)
      sets the child references of the anchor to the passed Node, as well as the father reference of the passed Node to anchor.
      int size()
      Returns the current size (number of non-equivalent data objects) stored inside the tree.
      private void swapColours(RedBlackTree.Node o, RedBlackTree.Node p)
      swaps the colours of the two passed Node objects

        anchor always points to root. Does not hold any data.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlackHeight

        public int getBlackHeight()
        Returns current black height of the red black tree.
        Returns:
        black height if the tree

      • getRoot

        public RedBlackTree.Node getRoot()
        Returns current root of the tree.
        Returns:
        root of tree

      • getClosestNode

        private RedBlackTree.Node getClosestNode(RedBlackTree.Node p)
        Returns Node whose data is the least greatest compared to passed Node. In other words, returns the Node whose data is the next greatest compared to passed.
        Parameters:
        p - Node to find closest Node to
        Returns:
        closest Node in ascending order from p

      • rGetClosestNode

        private RedBlackTree.Node rGetClosestNode(RedBlackTree.Node p)
        Returns Node whose data is the least less compared to passed Node. In other words, returns the Node whose data is the next small compared to passed Node.
        Parameters:
        p - Node to find closest Node to
        Returns:
        closest Node in descending order from p

      • setAnchor

        private void setAnchor(RedBlackTree.Node root)
        sets the child references of the anchor to the passed Node, as well as the father reference of the passed Node to anchor. The passed Node should always be the root of the RedBlackTree
        Parameters:
        root - Node that anchor should point to.

      • swapColours

        private void swapColours(RedBlackTree.Node o,
                         RedBlackTree.Node p)
        swaps the colours of the two passed Node objects

      • repairInsert

        private void repairInsert(RedBlackTree.Node p)
        Repairs the properties of the RedBlackTree after insertion.
        Parameters:
        p - problematic Node to start repair from

      • delete

        private void delete(RedBlackTree.Node p)
        Detes passed Node from RedBlackTree. Calls repairDelete() after insertion to restore the properties of the RedBlackTree.
        Parameters:
        p - Node to delete from tree.

      • repairDelete

        private void repairDelete(RedBlackTree.Node p)
        Restores properties of the RedBlackTree after a deletion.
        Parameters:
        p - problematic Node to start repair from.

      • leftRotate

        private void leftRotate(RedBlackTree.Node p)
        Performs a left rotation of the passed Node.
        Parameters:
        p - Node to leftroatte.

      • rightRotate

        private void rightRotate(RedBlackTree.Node p)
        Performs a right rotation of the passed Node.
        Parameters:
        p - Node to right rotate.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(E element)
        Returns whether passed data is stored inside RedBlackTree by calling the node.contains() Method on the current root.
        Parameters:
        element - element to look for in tree
        Returns:
        true if element

      • minNode

        private RedBlackTree.Node minNode()
        Returns the Node wih the minimal data inside.
        Returns:
        Minimum Node

      • maxNode

        private RedBlackTree.Node maxNode()
        Returns the Node with the maximum data inside.
        Returns:
        Maximum Node

      • add

        public boolean add(E data)
        Add passed Data into RedBlackTree by calling the insert Method of the current root with data to be inserted as argument. Null object cannot be stored inside the tree. Trying so will throw a NullPointerException. Also returns a DuplicateElementException if the data is already stored inside the tree.
        Specified by:
        add in interface java.util.Collection<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
        Overrides:
        add in class java.util.AbstractCollection<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
        Parameters:
        data - data to insert into tree.
        Returns:
        Returns true in insertion was successful.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the data to be stored is null
        DuplicateElementException - if the data is already stored inside the tree

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the current size (number of non-equivalent data objects) stored inside the tree.
        Specified by:
        size in interface java.util.Collection<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
        Specified by:
        size in class java.util.AbstractCollection<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
        Returns:
        number of stored elements.

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<E> iterator()
        Returns an in-order iterator to the current RedBlackTree.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.util.Collection<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
        Specified by:
        iterator in class java.util.AbstractCollection<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
        Returns:
        in-order iterator.

      • rIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<E> rIterator()
